Unknown.translation: Amongst all the vegetation, both Silk cotton (Simhal) and Bamboo are the tallest but feeling proud of their size and greatness, they remain failures.

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn subwsnw kY syNbul subws hoq; bwNsu inrgMD bhu gwNTnu iFTweI kY [

Unknown.translation: At least a Silk cotton tree do acquire some fragrance from a Sandalwood tree but due to the obstinacy of the knots, a Bamboo tree remains bereft of Sandalwood smell.

lines.gurmukhi: syNbl ky Pl qUl Kg imRg CwieAw qw kY; bwNsu qau brn doKI jwrq burweI kY [

Unknown.translation: The cotton of the Silk cotton tree is put to use. The vast expanse of the tree provides shade for birds and other animals, but a Bamboo is family destroyer and due to its evil nature, it burns the other Bamboos that it rubs with.

Unknown.translation: Similarly an apostate Sikh becomes an obedient of the Guru by obtaining his sermons and enjoying the company of godly persons. But one who turns his face despite belonging to Guru, who is guilty of doing wrong to his Guru-brothers pushed around from door
